tone: Close journey replies asking customers to text in their birthday to receive a gift
dos_and_donts: Offer help if the customer replies back to the automated message with number 0
templates: For checkout issues use COI shortcut
If the site doesn't accept the customers payment method use PME shortcut
promo_and_exclusions: The welcome code can be applied to discounted items
For issues with the code GETSTARTED15 use GSE shortcut
The 20% off welcome offer will automatically be added at checkout for their first order
